17.<pipipi_high>|「これで このターンの行動が| 『たたかう』に 決定:
|The action decided for this turn is "Fight"!|
|Once all players' actions have been chosen,|Batoen will act in order starting from the|highest Agility.|
|In other words, if your Agility is high,|you'll get to act sooner more often! Make|sure to check your Agility!|

18.<pipipi_high>|「見事な『チェンジアタック』でしたわ！|<br>|「:
|Nice job with that Change Attack!|
|You can use the "Change" command 3 times in a|one-on-one battle, and 2 times in a Free|Battle.|
|Change Attacks can be very powerful, so|make sure to use them at the most opportune|moment!|
|Well, this is the end of my explanation.|
|If you need to brush up again, you can check|"How to Play" in the Batoen Launcher.|
|From what I've seen, I have a feeling that|you'll be an excellent Batoen Fighter!|
